actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce multicandidate political committee contribution limits.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act to reduce from $5,000 to $1,000 the limitations on multicandidate political committee contributions to a candidate or the candidate's authorized political committees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce multicandidate political committee contribution limits.
